name: Alone and Dangerous
description:
You are a lone soldier in the midst of a zombie apocalypse. All around you is a complete deserted wasteland and hordes of the walking dead eager to take a little bite out of you.
Move around the arena and fire from a pistol, shotgun, machine gun or even a sniper rifle at the undead advancing towards you. No time to think, just shoot and run. Survive as long as possible, and the upgrades and experience that drop from corpses will help you take as many hungry undead with you to the next world.

Alone and Dangerous is a 3D action shooter in the setting of a zombie apocalypse. Controlling an armed soldier, you confront the constantly arriving forces of zombies.

Game Features:
- Several types of weapons
- Leveling up with random improvements
- Hordes of zombies
